info.title: Azure IoT Central
info.description: Azure IoT Central is a service that makes it easy to connect, monitor, and manage your IoT devices at scale.

ADGroupUser.description: The active directory group user definition.

tenantId.description: The AAD tenant ID of the AD Group.

objectId.description: The AAD object ID of the AD Group.

AnyValue.description: Can be anything: string, number, array, object, etc. (except `null`)

id.description: Unique ID of the API token.

expiry.description: String-formatted date representing the time when the token expires.

ApiTokenCollection.description: The paged results of API tokens.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of API tokens.

BarChartConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying options for a bar chart tile.

format.description: The format configuration of the chart

queryRange.description: The query range configuration of the chart

BlobStorageV1DestinationAuth.description: The authentication definition for blob storage destination.

type.description: The kind of authentication to use.

BlobStorageV1DestinationConnectionString.description: The authentication definition with connection string for blob storage destination.

connectionString.description: The connection string for accessing the blob storage account.

containerName.description: Name of the container where data should be written in the storage account.

BlobStorageV1DestinationSystemAssignedMa.description: The authentication definition with system assigned managed identity for blob storage destination.

endpointUri.description: The storage account's blob service endpoint URL.

containerName.description: Name of the container where data should be written in the storage account.

CapabilityAggregateFunctionType.description: The type of aggregation to be applied on capability data.

target.description: The device template which defines the target capability for the job.

path.description: The path to the target capability within the device template.

value.description: The value used to update the target capability, if any.

ChartFormatConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying formatting options for a chart tile.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of entities.

CommandConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying options for a command tile.

device.description: The device id that the command is associated with

command.description: The command id to associate the tile to

CommandTileConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying options for a command tile

group.description: The ID of the device group to display

command.description: The command to reference in the tile

device.description: The device to reference in the tile

CountQueryRangeConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying the number of data points to query for a tile.

count.description: The maximum number of data points to query for.

tiles.description: The tiles displayed by the dashboard.

personal.description: Whether the dashboard is personal and can only be viewed by the current user.

favorite.description: Whether the dashboard is favorited or not

etag.description: Etag to prevent conflict when updating the dashboard.

organizations.description: The organization the dashboard belongs to. If not present, the dashboard is root-level or personal. only one organization is supported today, multiple organizations will be supported soon.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of dashboards.

DataExplorerTileConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying options for an image tile

queryRange.description: The query range configuration of the chart

query.description: The id of the Data Explorer query to show in the tile

DataExplorerV1Destination.description: The azure data explorer destination definition.

clusterUrl.description: The resource URI of the Data Explorer instance.

database.description: Name Data Explorer database where data should be written.

table.description: The table within the Data Explorer database that will receive the data.

DataExplorerV1DestinationAuth.description: The authentication definition for azure data explorer destination.

type.description: The kind of authentication to use.

DataExplorerV1DestinationServicePrincipa.description: The authentication definition with service principal for azure data explorer destination.

DataExplorerV1DestinationSystemAssignedM.description: The authentication definition with system assigned managed identity for azure data explorer destination.

code.description: The code for the error that occurred.

message.description: The description of the error that occurred.

status.description: Indication of the current health and operation of the export or destination.

errors.description: Errors encountered by the export or destination.

lastExportTime.description: The timestamp of the last message that was sent to the export or destination.

DateJobScheduleEnd.description: The date based end definition of job schedule.

date.description: The date when to end the scheduled job.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of destinations.

transform.description: Query for transforming the message structure to a particular output.

id.description: The ID of the destination where data should be sent.

transform.description: Query for transforming the message structure to a particular output.

etag.description: ETag used to prevent conflict in device updates.

template.description: The device template definition for the device.

enabled.description: Whether the device connection to IoT Central has been enabled.

provisioned.description: Whether resources have been allocated for the device.

organizations.description: List of organization IDs that the device is a part of, only one organization is supported today, multiple organizations will be supported soon.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of devices.

id.description: The request ID of the device command execution.

connectionTimeout.description: Connection timeout in seconds to wait for a disconnected device to come online. Defaults to 0 seconds.

responseTimeout.description: Response timeout in seconds to wait for a command completion on a device. Defaults to 30 seconds.

request.description: The payload for the device command, support any primitive types or object.

response.description: The payload of the device command response, support any primitive types or object.

responseCode.description: The status code of the device command response.

DeviceCommandCollection.description: The paged results of device command executions.

value.description: The collection of device command executions.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of device command executions.

DeviceCountTileConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying options for a device count tile.

group.description: The ID of the device group to display

format.description: The format configuration of the lkv tile

idScope.description: ID scope for connecting to the IoT Central application.

symmetricKey.description: The symmetric key credentials for the device.

x509.description: The X.509 credential information for the device.

tpm.description: The TPM credentials for the device.

id.description: Unique ID of the device group.

displayName.description: Display name of the device group.

filter.description: Query defining which devices should be in this group, [Query Language Reference](https://aka.ms/iotcquery).

etag.description: ETag used to prevent conflict in device group updates.

organizations.description: List of organization IDs of the device group, only one organization is supported today, multiple organizations will be supported soon.

DeviceGroupCollection.description: The paged results of device groups.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of device groups.

DeviceGroupDeviceCollection.description: The paged results of devices belonging to the device group.

value.description: The collection of devices belonging to the device group.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of devices in the group.

DeviceProperties.description: Property values associated with the device.

DeviceRelationship.description: An object representing the relationship between an upstream and a downstream device.

id.description: The unique identifier of this relationship.

source.description: The device ID of the source (parent) device.

target.description: The device ID of the target (child) device.

DeviceRelationshipCollection.description: The paged results of device relationships.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of device relationships.

value.description: The last known value of this device telemetry.

timestamp.description: String-formatted date representing the time when the telemetry value was sent.

@id.description: Unique ID of the device template.

@type.description: The JSON-LD types of this device template.

etag.description: ETag used to prevent conflict in device template updates.

displayName.description: Display name of the device template.

description.description: Detailed description of the device template.

capabilityModel.description: The capability model utilized by this device template.

deploymentManifest.description: Deployment manifest associated to this device template.

DeviceTemplateCollection.description: The paged results of device templates.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of device templates.

DeviceTemplateMigrationJobData.description: The device template migration job data definition.

template.description: The target device template to which devices will be migrated.

Enrichment.description: The enrichment definition for data export.

target.description: The device template or interface which defines the target capability for the enrichment.

path.description: The path to the target capability within the device template or the system property to use.

value.description: The raw value used for the enrichment.

id.description: Unique ID of the enrollment group.

displayName.description: Display name of the enrollment group.

enabled.description: Whether the devices using the group are allowed to connect to IoT Central.

type.description: Type of devices that connect through the group.

attestation.description: The attestation mechanism for the enrollment group.

etag.description: ETag used to prevent conflict in enrollment group updates.

EnrollmentGroupCollection.description: The paged results of enrollment groups.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of enrollment groups.

ErrorDetails.description: The detail information of the error.

time.description: The time that error request failed.

EventChartConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying options for a event chart tile.

queryRange.description: The query range configuration of the event chart

EventHistoryChartConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying options for a event history chart tile.

queryRange.description: The query range configuration of the event chart

format.description: The format configuration of the event history chart

EventHubsV1DestinationAuth.description: The authentication definition for event hub destination.

type.description: The kind of authentication to use.

EventHubsV1DestinationConnectionStringAu.description: The authentication definition with connection string for event hub destination.

connectionString.description: The connection string for accessing the Event Hubs namespace, including the `EntityPath` of the event hub.

EventHubsV1DestinationSystemAssignedMana.description: The authentication definition with system assigned managed identity for event hub destination.

hostName.description: The host name of the Event Hubs namespace.

enabled.description: Toggle to start/stop an export from sending data.

source.description: The type of data to export.

values.name: DeviceTemplateLifecycle
values.description: Destination source from device template lifecycle

filter.description: Query defining which events from the source should be exported.

enrichments.description: Additional pieces of information to include with each sent message. Data is represented as a set of key/value pairs, where the key is the name of the enrichment that will appear in the output message and the value identifies the data to send.

destinations.description: The list of destinations to which the export should send data.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of exports.

transform.description: Query for transforming the message structure to a particular output.

ExternalContentTileConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying options for an external content tile.

sourceUrl.description: URL of the website to render inside the tile. Must be a valid HTTPS URL.

account.description: The storage account name where to upload the file to

connectionString.description: The connection string used to configure the storage account

container.description: The name of the container inside the storage account

sasTtl.description: ISO 8601 duration standard, The amount of time the device’s request to upload a file is valid before it expires.

state.description: The state of the file upload configuration

etag.description: ETag used to prevent conflict with multiple uploads

GroupAttestation.description: The attestation definition for an enrollment group.

symmetricKey.description: The symmetric key credentials for this attestation.

GroupTileConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying a set of devices to display data for in a tile.

group.description: The ID of the device group to display

devices.description: The list of associated devices to display

x509.description: The X.509 credentials for this attestation.

HeatMapConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying options for a heat map tile.

queryRange.description: The query range configuration of the heat map chart

format.description: The format configuration of the heatmap chart

ImageTileConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying options for an image tile

image.description: The asset id of the image to display

href.description: The URL the tile links to when clicked

format.description: Format options for the image tile

backgroundColor.description: The background color to show behind the image

fitImage.description: Whether to stretch the image to fit the aspect ratio of the tile or display in the image's native aspect ratio

textColor.description: The color of the text in the tile

textSize.description: Size of the test in the tile

textSizeUnit.description: The unit of size for the text in the tile

values.name: Pixels
values.description: Set the text unit to pixels

showTitle.description: Whether or not to show the display name text on the tile

scheduledJobId.description: Id of the scheduled job definition that created this job.

group.description: The ID of the device group on which to execute the job.

batch.description: The batching configuration for the job.

cancellationThreshold.description: The cancellation threshold for the job.

data.description: The capabilities being updated by the job and the values with which they are being updated.

start.description: The start time of the job

end.description: The end time of the job

progress.description: The progress statistics of the job.

status.description: Indicates whether the job is starting, running, etc.

organizations.description: List of organizations of the job, only one organization is supported today, multiple organizations will be supported soon.

type.description: Whether batching is done on a specified number of devices or a percentage of the total devices.

values.name: Number
values.description: Job Batching based on number of devices.

values.name: Percentage
values.description: Job Batching based percentage of total applied devices.

value.description: The number or percentage of devices on which batching is done.

type.description: Whether the cancellation threshold is per a specified number of devices or a percentage of the total devices.

values.name: Number
values.description: Job cancellation threshold based on specified number of devices.

values.name: Percentage
values.description: Job cancellation threshold based on percentage of total devices.

value.description: The number or percentage of devices on which the cancellation threshold is applied.

batch.description: Whether the cancellation threshold applies per-batch or to the overall job.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of jobs.

id.description: ID of the device whose job status is being provided.

status.description: Indicates whether the job is starting, running, etc. for the given device.

JobDeviceStatusCollection.description: The paged results of job device statuses.

value.description: The collection of job device statuses.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of job device statuses.

JobProgress.description: progress summary for a scheduled job.

total.description: The total number of entities targeted by the job.

pending.description: The number of entities for which the job is not yet running.

completed.description: The number of entities for which the job has completed.

failed.description: The number of entities for which the job has failed.

recurrence.description: The recurrence of the scheduled job. If not provided, the job will run once at the specified start time.

values.name: Daily
values.description: The job will run once daily

values.name: Weekly
values.description: The job will run once every week

values.name: Monthly
values.description: The job will run once every month

start.description: The start time for the scheduled job

end.description: The specification of when to end the scheduled job.

JobScheduleEnd.description: The end definition of job schedule.

type.description: Type of the job schedule end.

KpiTileConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying options for kpi tile.

queryRange.description: The query range configuration of the KPI chart

format.description: The format configuration of the lkv tile

LabelTileConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying options for a label tile

text.description: The text to display in the tile

textSize.description: The font size of the text being displayed

wordWrap.description: Whether to wrap the text being displayed

LineChartConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying options for a line chart tile.

queryRange.description: The query range configuration of the line chart

format.description: The format configuration of the line chart

LkvTileConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying options for a last known value tile.

showTrend.description: Show the trend between the last known value and the value before that

format.description: The format configuration of the lkv tile

MapFormatConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying formatting options for a map tile.

zoomLevel.description: The zoom level of the map

MapPropertyConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying options for a map property tile.

MapTelemetryConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying options for a map telemetry tile.

MapTileConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying options for a map tile.

zoomLevel.description: The zoom level of the map

MarkdownTileConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying options for a markdown tile.

href.description: Link to visit when tile is clicked

description.description: Markdown string to render inside the tile

OccurrencesJobScheduleEnd.description: The occurences based end definition of job schedule.

occurrences.description: The number of occurrences after which to end the scheduled job.

parent.description: ID of the parent of the organization.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of organizations.

roles.description: List of role assignments that specify the permissions to access the application.

PieChartConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying options for a pie chart tile.

queryRange.description: The query range configuration of the pie chart

format.description: The format configuration of the pie chart

PropertyTileConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying options for a property tile.

format.description: The format configuration of the property tile

QueryRangeConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying how much data to return for a tile.

type.description: The type of time range - 'count' or 'time'.

role.description: ID of the role for this role assignment.

organization.description: ID of the organization for this role assignment.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of roles.

etag.description: ETag used to prevent conflict in scheduled job updates.

id.description: Unique ID of the scheduled job.

displayName.description: Display name of the scheduled job.

description.description: Detailed description of the scheduled job.

group.description: The ID of the device group on which to execute the scheduled job.

batch.description: The batching configuration for the scheduled job.

cancellationThreshold.description: The cancellation threshold for the scheduled job.

data.description: Data related to the operation being performed by this job. All entries must be of the same type.

organizations.description: List of organizations of the job, only one organization is supported today, multiple organizations will be supported soon.

schedule.description: The schedule at which to execute the job.

enabled.description: Whether the scheduled job is enabled.

completed.description: Whether the scheduled job has completed.

ScheduledJobCollection.description: The paged results of scheduled job definitions.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of scheduled jobs.

ServiceBusQueueV1Destination.description: The service bus queue destination definition.

ServiceBusQueueV1DestinationAuth.description: The authentication definition for service bus queue definition.

type.description: The kind of authentication to use.

ServiceBusQueueV1DestinationConnectionSt.description: The authentication definition with connection string for service bus queue definition.

connectionString.description: The connection string for accessing the Service Bus namespace, including the `EntityPath` of the queue.

ServiceBusQueueV1DestinationSystemAssign.description: The authentication definition with system assigned managed identity for service bus queue definition.

hostName.description: The host name of the Service Bus namespace.

ServiceBusTopicV1Destination.description: The service bus topic destination definition.

ServiceBusTopicV1DestinationAuth.description: The authentication definition for service bus topic destination.

type.description: The kind of authentication to use.

ServiceBusTopicV1DestinationConnectionSt.description: The authentication definition with connection string for service bus topic destination.

connectionString.description: The connection string for accessing the Service Bus namespace, including the `EntityPath` of the topic.

ServiceBusTopicV1DestinationSystemAssign.description: The authentication definition with system assigned managed identity for service bus topic destination.

hostName.description: The host name of the Service Bus namespace.

tenantId.description: The AAD tenant ID of the service principal.

objectId.description: The AAD object ID of the service principal.

signingCertificates.description: The X.509 signing certificates for this credential.

verified.description: Whether the certificate has been verified.

certificate.description: The string representation of this certificate.

etag.description: ETag used to prevent conflict across multiple updates

primary.description: The primary X.509 certificate for this credential.

secondary.description: The secondary X.509 certificate for this credential.

StateChartConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying options for a state chart tile.

queryRange.description: The query range configuration of the state chart

StateHistoryChartConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying options for a state history chart tile.

queryRange.description: The query range configuration of the state chart

format.description: The format configuration of the state history chart

primaryKey.description: The primary key for this credential.

secondaryKey.description: The secondary key for this credential.

symmetricKey.description: The symmetric key credentials for this attestation.

TextFormatConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying formatting options for a text based tile.

decimalPlaces.description: The number of decimal places being displayed

textSize.description: The font size of the text being displayed

wordWrap.description: Whether to wrap the text being displayed

Tile.description: Configuration specifying tile object, including the layout, display name and configuration.

TileCapability.description: Specifies the capability to be displayed in the tile.

capability.description: The path of the capability associated with data to be rendered in the tile.

aggregateFunction.description: The aggregate function to apply to the data.

TileCapabilityConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying an array of capabilities to be displayed in the tile.

TileConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying information about a tile.

type.description: The type of widget the tile renders

TileTextSizeUnit.description: The unit of size for the text in the tile

values.name: Points
values.description: Set the text unit to points

TimeQueryRangeConfiguration.description: Configuration specifying the time range and resolution of data to return for a tile.

duration.description: The time range to use when querying data.

resolution.description: The resolution to aggregate data over.

TimeRangeDuration.description: The duration of time to look back when querying data.

TimeRangeResolution.description: The resolution to aggregate data over for each data point.

endorsementKey.description: The TPM endorsement key for this credential.

tpm.description: The TPM credentials for this attestation.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of users.

url.description: The URL to invoke when exporting data.

queryCustomizations.description: Additional query parameters that should be added to each request.

headerCustomizations.description: Additional headers that should be added to each request.

WebhookV1DestinationAuth.description: The authentication definition for webhook destination.

type.description: The kind of authentication to use.

WebhookV1DestinationCustomization.description: The customization definition for webhook destination.

value.description: The value to use for this webhook customization.

secret.description: Whether to consider the value to be a secret and hide it when retrieving the destination configuration.

WebhookV1DestinationHeaderAuth.description: The authentication definition with header for webhook destination.

value.description: Value to use for the Authorization header when making requests.

WebhookV1DestinationOAuthAuth.description: The authentication definition with OAuth for webhook destination.

tokenUrl.description: URL where an access token can be retrieved.

clientId.description: OAuth2 client ID used when retrieving the token.

clientSecret.description: OAuth2 client secret used to retrieve the token.

values.name: Auto
values.description: Use automatic Content-Type for token request

values.name: Json
values.description: Content-Type as JSON for token request

values.name: UrlEncoded
values.description: Content-Type as UrlEncoded for token request

clientCertificates.description: The X.509 client certificates for this credential.

x509.description: The X.509 credentials for this attestation.

certificate.description: The string representation of this certificate.

sha1Thumbprint.description: The SHA-1 hash value of the certificate.

primary.description: The primary X.509 certificate for this credential.

secondary.description: The secondary X.509 certificate for this credential.

certificate.description: The string representation of this certificate.

get.summary: Get the list of API tokens in an application. The token value will never be returned for security reasons.

default.description: An error response received from the IoT Central Service.

x-ms-error-code.description: Error code for specific error that occurred.

get.summary: Get an API token by ID.

parameters.name: tokenId
parameters.description: Unique ID for the API token.

default.description: An error response received from the IoT Central Service.

x-ms-error-code.description: Error code for specific error that occurred.

put.summary: Create a new API token in the application to use in the IoT Central public API. The token value will be returned in the response, and won't be returned again in subsequent requests.

parameters.name: tokenId
parameters.description: Unique ID for the API token.

default.description: An error response received from the IoT Central Service.

BaseDomain.name: baseDomain
BaseDomain.description: The base domain for all Azure IoT Central service requests.

DeviceGroupId.name: deviceGroupId
DeviceGroupId.description: Unique ID for the device group.

DeviceTemplateId.name: deviceTemplateId
DeviceTemplateId.description: Unique [Digital Twin Model Identifier](https://github.com/Azure/opendigitaltwins-dtdl/blob/master/DTDL/v2/dtdlv2.md#digital-twin-model-identifier) of the device template.

EnrollmentGroupId.name: enrollmentGroupId
EnrollmentGroupId.description: Unique ID of the enrollment group.

Entry.name: entry
Entry.description: Entry of certificate only support primary and secondary.

Filter.name: $filter
Filter.description: An expression on the resource type that selects the resources to be returned.

OrderBy.name: $orderby
OrderBy.description: An expression that specify the order of the returned resources.

RelationshipId.name: relationshipId
RelationshipId.description: Unique ID of a relationship between devices.

ScheduledJobId.name: scheduledJobId
ScheduledJobId.description: Unique ID of the scheduled job.

Top.name: $top
Top.description: The maximum number of resources to return from the collection.

Unmodeled.name: unmodeled
Unmodeled.description: The query parameter for supporting unmodeled properties.

Version.name: api-version
Version.description: The version of the API being called.
